Clean POM Maven Plugin

  • Organizational POM
  • Coding standards
  • Commons testing
  • Java archetype
  • Other projects

cleanpom:clean-xml

Full name:

net.trajano.mojo:cleanpom-maven-plugin:1.1.1:clean-xml

Description:

Cleans XML sources in general. Tied to the LifecyclePhase.INITIALIZE so sources are cleaned up before doing anything else.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: initialize.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
xmlFileSets FileSet[] - List of XML filesets to process. This defaults to src/main/*.[xml|xsd|xslt] and src/site/*.xml .

Parameter Details

xmlFileSets:

List of XML filesets to process. This defaults to src/main/*.[xml|xsd|xslt] and src/site/*.xml .
  • Type: org.apache.maven.model.FileSet[]
  • Required: No

Version: 1.1.1
